name: JAB - Just Another Brawler
description:
Team Hoodie Games is a team of 7 students who learn how to develop digital games at Games Academy Berlin. We are in our third semester and are developing a 2D Brawler called "JAB - Just another Brawler".

Producer: Manuel Handrick

2D Artist - Character: Laura Lückemeyer

2D Artist - Character: Lisa-Marie Albrecht

2D Artist - Enviroment/VFX: Paul Schuldt

Programmer: Noah Hübner

Designer: Harun Ahmadie

Designer: Benton Culp

Special Thanks to Maximilian Raabe

REQUIREMENTS:

Two controllers + a friend
